Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • Bank

  • public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
    Bank class hold the bank accounts, Check for current account that we logged in to. Checking for password and if the account exists.
    Author:
    Caroline Barra University of Brighton

      • addBankAccount

        public boolean addBankAccount(BankAccount a)
        Parameters:
        a - Account
        Returns:
        Add the bank account to bank If number of accounts is less then 10 or false if the bank is full

      • addBankAccount

                              int pinPsswd,

      • checkForBankAcc

        public boolean checkForBankAcc(int newAccNumber)
        Parameters:
        newAccNumber - input for the user
        Returns:
        if the input match if one of the bank account it exists. if return false the input doesn't match

      • checkPsswd

        public boolean checkPsswd(int newAccNumber,
                          int newPinPsswd)
        Parameters:
        newAccNumber - input for the user for account number
        newPinPsswd - input for the user for password
        Returns:
        if the input for acc and psswd match with one of the bank account return that bank account if return false if the password isn't correct

      • deposit

        public boolean deposit(double amount)
        Parameters:
        amount - user input for amount to deposit to bank account
        Returns:
        if the account is logged in, deposit the amount on the account if false do nothing

      • getBalance

        public double getBalance()
        Returns:
        if the account is logged in, display the balance of the account if false do nothing

      • getNewPin

        public boolean getNewPin(int newPin)
        Parameters:
        newPin - user input for new password
        Returns:
        if the account is logged in, change old password to the user new password

      • loggedIn

        public boolean loggedIn()
        Returns:
        if true the account is logged in if return false the account is null

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Reset the bank to a 'logged out' state account is set back to null

      • prevPsswd

        public boolean prevPsswd(int prevPinPsswd)
        Check if the password is correct to create new one
        Parameters:
        prevPinPsswd -
        Returns:
        true value the passwords matches otherwise returns false

      • withdraw

        public boolean withdraw(double amount)
        Parameters:
        amount - user input for amount to withdraw to bank account
        Returns:
        if the account is logged in, withdraw the amount on the account if false do nothing
